name: Fish Trap
description:
The game starts with the murder of the count Olaf. Detective Poisson, has to find out the murderer among four suspects. Poisson has to talk with other fishes to gather evidences and he has to explore the Titanic to find proofs.

Gathering proofs and evidences, the player will unlock new rooms and characters to talk with: he will use them in order to find out the guilty.

HOW TO PLAY:

The player moves itself in the water. He moves:

  • Using WASD, the player move forward, back, right, left;
  • The mouse turn the camera.


To interact with all  the game’s systems, the player, has to press the  SPACE  button.

The player, in the game, has the chance to interact with two macro system:

  • NPC;
  • Environment/ Object.
